name: Authentic Key Lime Pie
author: JetsonRING
summary: I am a Florida native who raised Key lime trees in the back yard. This recipe is as authentic as it gets. A real Key lime pie is plain, simple. This is the recipe I grew up with. I hope you like it.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Whisk condensed milk and egg yolks together in a large mixing bowl
Mix in Key lime juice; mixture will be thin at first but will thicken as it is whisked
Pour into the graham cracker crust
Bake in the preheated oven until filling is firm to the touch and only slightly jiggly in the center, 12 to 15 minutes
Cool to room temperature, then refrigerate before serving, 5 hours to overnight
